backend/main.mo: Main actor defining products, offers, orders, customers, and access control, with seed data and comparison helpers for map ordering.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old data types and a minimal run function that preserves counters and state during upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report linking implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs for verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the role of each frontend file in routing, UI, admin flow, and customer flow.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/README.testing.md: Guide explaining the frontend testing setup using Vitest and React Testing Library.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Defines the main admin layout with header navigation, notification badge, and routed content area.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminAcces: Shows a warning card when admin access is not initialized and instructs users to provide an admin token.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminGuard: Protects admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, redirecting or showing messages as needed.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminUserM: Provides a user dropdown menu for admins with logout functionality that clears identity and cache.
frontend/src/admin/notifications/useOrde: Tracks new orders since last seen and exposes notifications, unread count, and a mark-as-read function.
Handles admin login flow, verifies admin status, and shows access denied or redirects accordingly.
frontend/src/admin/pages/CustomerDetailP: Displays detailed customer info including contact details and order history.
frontend/src/admin/pages/CustomersListPa: Lists all customers with search filtering and links to individual customer detail pages.
frontend/src/admin/pages/NotificationsFe: Displays order notifications with unread count, allows marking all as read, and renders each notification with order details.
frontend/src/admin/pages/OffersManagemen: Provides CRUD UI for offers including banner upload, editing, activation toggles, and date handling.
frontend/src/admin/pages/OrdersDashboard: Shows sortable order list with status badges, details, and controls for updating order status.
frontend/src/admin/pages/ProductsManagem: Manages products with search, create/edit dialogs, image upload, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines full React Router route tree for customer and admin sections, including guarded admin routes and layout providers.
frontend/src/customer/cart/CartContext.t: Implements cart state container with add, remove, update, clear functions and computed totals.
frontend/src/customer/CustomerLayout.tsx: Defines customer-facing layout with header, navigation, cart badge, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/customer/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart with item quantity controls, removal options, and an order summary, handling empty-cart states.
frontend/src/customer/pages/CheckoutPage: Provides a checkout form, validates delivery details, submits orders, and navigates to confirmation on success.
frontend/src/customer/pages/OffersPage.t: Fetches and displays active promotional offers with banners, dates, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/customer/pages/OrderConfirm: Shows a confirmation message with the order ID after successful checkout and provides navigation options.
frontend/src/customer/pages/ProductDetai: Displays detailed product information, stock status, and allows selecting quantity and adding the item to the cart.
frontend/src/customer/pages/ProductListP: Lists products with search filtering, stock indicators, and quick add-to-cart functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity changes, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state and login flow using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors, including admin checks, product and offer fetching, user profile operations, and order placement.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, defining a grocery-themed color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/EntryLandingPage.tsx: Implements the marketing landing page with hero imagery, features, and navigation to the shop.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a styled 404 page with navigation options back to home or the shop.
frontend/src/test/adminAccessFlow.test.t: Empty test file placeholder for admin access flow tests.
frontend/src/test/customerHappyPath.test: Empty test file placeholder for customer happyâ€‘path tests.
frontend/src/test/mocks/actorMocks.ts: Empty placeholder for mock actor implementations.
frontend/src/test/renderWithProviders.ts: Empty placeholder for a test utility to render components with required providers.
frontend/src/test/setupTests.ts: Empty setup file for configuring the test environment.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across sessions and storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing features, new feature requests, and known issues for build and release planning.
